Description: TAP Stack - Task Assignment Platform CloudFormation Template

EnvironmentSuffix.Description: Environment suffix for resource naming (e.g., dev, staging, prod)

WebServerInstanceType.Description: EC2 instance type for web servers

DatabaseInstanceType.Description: EC2 instance type for database servers

KeyName.Description: Optional EC2 KeyPair name to enable SSH access; leave blank to skip

LatestAmiId.Description: Latest Amazon Linux 2023 AMI via SSM parameter

CreateCloudTrail.Description: Set to 'true' to create CloudTrail. Default is 'false' to avoid hitting regional trail limits; enable only if you need a new trail.

CreateGuardDutyDetector.Description: Set to 'false' to skip creating a GuardDuty Detector

EnvironmentSuffix.Description: Environment suffix used for this deployment
